posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

5/23/22 - 5/29/22
Issue - V104
Current Release: 1.10.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Updates

  • Come meet the Streamlit team at Snowflake Summit!
  • Version 1.10.0 was released.
  • The wait is over—multipage apps are here! Now you can quickly and easily add more pages to your apps.

Featured Content

  • stlite @whitphx
  • Magic Data Apps with Snowflake, Streamlit, and DuckDB
  • Streamlit Keyword Density Checker Web App | Complete Streamlit Python Course | Tutorial 1

Tutorials/Introduction

  • How to Build a Real-Time Transcription App in Python @dataprofessor
  • Stlite - Streamlit without Server - powered by Pyodide (WebAssembly) @1littlecoder
  • Kaggle Titanic ML End To End Deployment With Google Collab, Streamlit and Local Tunnel.
  • APRENDA CONSUMIR API’S E CRIAR UM APP COM PYTHON E STREAMLIT
  • Adding Interactive Plotly Charts to a Streamlit App @andymcd
  • Getting Started With Streamlit Web Based Applications @andymcd
  • How to Add a User Authentication Service (Login Form) in Streamlit
  • How to Build a Web App with Data Ingested through Versatile Data Kit
  • Deploying Basic Regression Model on Streamlit
  • Deploying Data-driven dashboards with Python.
  • Learn Streamlit Title API st.title
  • COMO CRIAR DASHBOARDS COM GRÁFICOS INTERATIVOS EM PYTHON
  • ساخت یک سایت شبیه unsplash با کتابخانه streamlit پایتون - streamlit tutorial python
  • A Practical Use-Case of Cloud-Native and Secured Dashboard with Google Cloud and Python Streamlit
  • Streamlit Web App with Coinmarketcap data
  • How to deploy ML prediction model as a WebApp on a Streamlit cloud
  • 4 Python Packages to Create Interactive Dashboards
  • Streamlit series: scrape NFL data and builld a dashboard
  • How Engaged Are You At Work?
  • Contact Tracing with Elasticsearch and Streamlit
  • Prediktivt vedlikehold av kulelager video 13: Streamlit app del 1
  • 【Techの道も一歩から】第47回「StreamlitのアプリをNginxで複数ホスティングする」
  • How To Automate Ecommerce Category Page Creation With Python
  • Streamlitとmediapipeで簡単に顔検出、手検出、姿勢推定Webアプリ(静止画ver)を作る
  • Python Streamlitを簡単に使ってみる

Science and Tech

  • Peripheral Neuropathy
  • Lei de Benford

NLP and Language

  • Game of Thrones Text Generation Application
  • Real-Time Voice recognising
  • Image to Speech Synthesis
  • WordGames
  • Bible Analysis with BERT
  • Streamlit Wine Taste & Reviews

Data Visualization

  • Fourier Series Visualizer
  • Prediktivt vedlikehold av kulelager video 12: Gjennomgang av streamlit app

Sports

  • Top 5 European Leagues Data

Finance and Business

  • Website Traffic Analysis Dashboard @sh4dowbyt3
  • Annual Income
  • TebakGaji
  • AGO Financial Markets Business Analytics Network - Prices and Trends
  • Fraud Detection Project
  • DOA Analytics & Prediction System
  • Marché immobilier en France
  • Stock Trend Prediction
  • NEM Pricing Tool

Geography and Society

  • GeoAnalytics Platform
  • Diaster Response Project
  • Streamlit Pollution

General

  • No-code Streamlit app @napoles3d
  • Draw mind map in broswer with python @BeyondMyself
  • Recomendação de filmes - via ML
  • The Asiak Movie Engine
  • Content Based Movie Recommender System
  • Local Machine Deployment using Streamlit
  • Streamlit Best Selling Books
  • Streamlit MovieList

Cool happenings and other things

  • New Component: Searchbox @m-wrzr
  • Women in Data Science (WiDS) Recife 2022 Upcoming event 6/4/22

Follow us
